affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Physical
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/115/130/145
COOLDOWN: 15/13/11/7
desc: Casts a poisonous spell on an enemy unit, causing damage and slowness over time, and eventual paralysis. Slow increases per level.
notes:
The damage is not reduced by damage block abilities.
The initial ministun will cancel channeling.
lore: One of the few Dezun rites used for offensive purposes, the paralytic enchantment often proves useful.
name: dazzle_poison_touch

cmb:
MANA COST: 140/130/120/110
COOLDOWN: 60/45/30/15
desc: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection.
notes: HP cannot go below 1 while under the effects of Shallow Grave, but Axe's Culling Blade will still kill the hero.
lore: Only a seasoned acolyte of the Shadow can properly perform the rite of preventing death.
name: dazzle_shallow_grave

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Allied Units
DAMAGE: Physical
cmb:
MANA COST: 80/90/100/110
COOLDOWN: 12/10/8/6
desc: Shadow Wave heals several allies, which in turn cause damage equal to their healing in a small area around them.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave, and it does not count toward the number of targets.
notes:
Prioritizes allied heroes over creeps.
If enemies are near multiple allied units affected by Shadow Wave, they can take multiple instances of damage.
lore: While it is a simplistic and routine rite among Shadow Priests, the Shadow Wave is also the most critical for success.
name: dazzle_shadow_wave

attrib:
RADIUS: 575 / 575 / 575
ARMOR PER SECOND: 0.75 / 1 / 1.25
DURATION: 24
SCEPTER RADIUS: 775 / 775 / 775
SCEPTER ARMOR PER SECOND: 1.25 / 1.5 / 1.75
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/100/100
COOLDOWN: 40
desc:
Applies a buff that increases allied hero armor or decreases enemy hero armor in the target area over time.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: Places a buff on units, so entering or leaving the area after the cast has no effect.
lore: His ethereal journey into the Nothl realm has allowed Dazzle to mend together the powers of light and dark, creating shifting waves of enchantments.
name: dazzle_weave
